wordpressPost.content:
GIVITEC LTD is a youth-led Nigeria IT services and electronics installations company.

The company also has a Vocational Training Institute, a JAMB-accredited CBT Centre and Event Centre within its owned building complex in central Benin City. GIVITEC LTD is the business arm of GIMOX INSTITUTE FOR VOCATIONS AND INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY also known as GIVITEC INSTITUTE which was established on October 8, 2017 in Benin City.
